root.name: Knightmare
root.description: A team of adventurers must seek out the four magic objects in the dungeons of Dunshelm. Help is at hand in the form of Treguard the dungeon master of Knightmare castle, who appears during the game to help you. With the Shield of Justice, Sword of Freedom, Cup of Life and Crown of Glory you might just stand a chance at defeating the evil Lord Fear.
